column4: My desktop folder disappeard, I might've deleted it unknowingly. Now all the contents of my home folder (~) are displayed on the "desktop".  I tried doing a "mkdir ~/Desktop" and restarted but that did not help.
so are you having issues with it?
yes, I want the desktop folder back
ok, I opened terminal, and then?
yes, its the one I created with mkdir ~/Desktop
well you can try using something like gtweakui to set it up back
you will have to download it first :)
I cant download gtweakui because apt-get thinks I am behind proxy and I use proxy at work
let me think of another way 1 sec
